name: Open DTL
description:
Left Mouse to draw and select colors in drawing mode, Right Mouse to erase

Movement - WASD

Shift to sprint

Enter to interact

------------------------------------------------------------------

There seems to be a bug that causes movement controls to break for an unknown reason?

An incredibly bare bones recreation of some of DTL's features in the Godot engine, all project files are available for download if you'd like to mess around with them!

unknown if ill keep working on this
